Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest Pakistani to reach 100 ODI wickets
Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs, contributing significantly to Pakistan's victory
Abdullah Shafique was dismissed by Najmul Hossain Shanto, giving Bangladesh their first wicket
Pakistan chased down 204 with 7 wickets to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam praised the team's performance across all three departments and acknowledged Fakhar Zaman's crucial knock
Shakib Al Hasan expressed disappointment with the batting and emphasized the need for collective performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's express pace battery, led by Shaheen Shah Afridi, bowled Bangladesh out for 204
Bangladesh's top four batsmen struggled to score runs
Pakistan aimed to finish the run chase in 30 overs after reaching 100
